text: Security increases for judge assigned to Donald Trump's January 6 criminal case  —  Security for the federal judge assigned to oversee the criminal case against former President Donald Trump over his attempts to overturn the 2020 election has been increased in the federal courthouse in Washington, DC.

Exclusive: Trump ally Bernie Kerik meets with special counsel investigators  —  Donald Trump ally Bernie Kerik met Monday with special counsel Jack Smith's investigators who are handling the probe related to the 2020 election aftermath and the January 6, 2021, insurrection.

Judge asks prosecutors to justify use of 2 grand juries in Trump documents case  —  Judge Aileen M. Cannon on Monday asked federal prosecutors to explain the use of grand juries in Florida and Washington in the classified documents case against Donald Trump even though charges were filed in South Florida.

Mississippi Officials Made 161 Voting Precinct Changes Since November 2022  —  Mississippi election officials have made 161 voting precinct changes since November 2022, leaving voters with slightly fewer voting precincts statewide and dozens moved after the completion of post-Census redistricting efforts …

Tucker Carlson could see Rebekah Mercer, Peter Thiel invest in his media company  — Rebekah Mercer has spoken with Tucker Carlson since his April departure from Fox News about possibly investing into his as yet unnamed media company.  — Peter Thiel has hinted to allies that he could invest in the media company, sources said.

Biden to Designate Monument Near Grand Canyon, Preventing Uranium Mining  —  Uranium extraction had already been restricted in the area, which Native tribes consider sacred, but the moratorium was set to expire in 2032.  Mr. Biden's designation will make it permanent.
